text: RT @SportingGreenSF: The NHL and its players association agreed to a 56-game regular season scheduled to run from Jan. 13-May 8 with a traditional Stanley Cup playoff format to follow. What remains unknown is where the @SanJoseSharks will play, writes @rossmckeon  https://t.co/MABEDzPqgb
